nodes.excerpt: Smooth Hand Mockup helps you showcase your apps and services properly with animated hand mockups. It is designed to make your videos self-explanatory and engaging.
nodes.title: Smooth Hand Mockups - Create animated hand mockups and gestures for all devices
nodes.author: Ismail Mesbah

localize.description: Smooth Hand Mockup可以帮助您通过动画手部模拟来正确展示您的应用程序和服务。它的设计是为了让你的视频自明和吸引人。
localize.tagline: 为所有设备创建动画手势模拟和手势。

nodes.excerpt: Glyphs 3 is a Mac font editor that puts you in control: quickly draw high-precision vectors, efficiently reuse shapes, and easily manage any number of letters, figures and symbols.
nodes.title: Glyphs 3.0 - Build, edit and manage fonts on your Mac
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Glyphs 3是一款Mac字体编辑器，让你掌控一切：快速绘制高精度矢量，高效重用形状，轻松管理任意数量的字母、数字和符号。
localize.tagline: 在 Mac 上建立、编辑和管理字体。

localize.description: Glyphs 3是一款Mac字體編輯器，讓你掌控一切：快速繪製高精度矢量，高效重用形狀，輕鬆管理任意數量的字母、數字和符號。
localize.tagline: 在 Mac 上建立、編輯和管理字體。

nodes.excerpt: Get the incredibly detailed and most accurate macOS UI Kit for Sketch. The library is loaded with hundreds of components, colors, and text styles. Arguably the fastest way to get started with your Mac app designs.
nodes.title: macOS 11 Big Sur UI Kit - The most detailed and accurate macOS UI Kit for Sketch 💎
nodes.author: Alexander Käßner

localize.description: 为Sketch获得令人难以置信的详细和最准确的macOS UI Kit。该库加载了数百种组件、颜色和文本样式。可以说是最快的方式来开始你的Mac应用设计。
localize.tagline: 最详细、最准确的macOS用户界面工具包，适用于Sketch💎。

localize.description: 爲Sketch獲得令人難以置信的詳細和最準確的macOS UI Kit。該庫加載了數百種組件、顏色和文本樣式。可以說是最快的方式來開始你的Mac應用設計。
localize.tagline: 最詳細、最準確的macOS用戶界面工具包，適用於Sketch💎。

nodes.excerpt: eProduct is and evidence-based product management software to hep you build customer driven products based on market evidence, reach market fit quicker and drive revenue. single platform to UNDERSTAND, MANAGE & LAUNCH products users need.

nodes.excerpt: ManyPixels is an on-demand & tech-enabled design service that is fast, affordable & easy-to-use. 1,500 startups and SMBs have used ManyPixels for their graphic and web design projects. Submit your design request today. Get it back tomorrow. Easy as that!

nodes.excerpt: Our Polaris for Admin Web UI kit is now available in Figma. You can access the full kit in Figma with reusable components and up-to-date Polaris guidelines, icons, and color palette. Find out more at https://figma.com/@shopify and https://polaris.shopify.com

nodes.excerpt: Tails is the ultimate TailwindCSS Page Creator. Need a website for your next great idea? Tails is the perfect tool to creating a beautiful landing page. Over 120 design blocks you can mix and match to craft the perfect landing page for your next project.
nodes.title: Tails - The ultimate TailwindCSS drag'n drop page creator
nodes.author: Tony Lea

localize.description: Tails是终极TailwinCSS页面创建器。需要一个网站来展示你的下一个好点子吗？Tails是创建漂亮登录页面的完美工具。超过120个设计模块，您可以混合搭配，为您的下一个项目制作完美的登录页。

nodes.excerpt: Open, browse, and drop icons from your existing IconJars. Add, delete, or replace icons in existing IconJars. Or, export your artboards to a new IconJar right in Illustrator - on Mac or Windows. You don't need to have IconJar installed (but we recommend it).
nodes.title: Icon Mason - Open, edit, & create IconJars directly in Adobe Illustrator
nodes.author: Scott Lewis

localize.description: 从现有的IconJars中打开、浏览和拖放图标。添加、删除或替换现有IconJars中的图标。或者，直接在Illustrator中将画板导出到新的IconJar(在Mac或Windows上)。您不需要安装IconJar(但我们建议您这样做)。
localize.tagline: 直接在Adobe Illustrator中打开、编辑和创建IconJars

localize.description: 從現有的IconJars中打開、瀏覽和拖放圖標。添加、刪除或替換現有IconJars中的圖標。或者，直接在Illustrator中將畫板導出到新的IconJar(在Mac或Windows上)。您不需要安裝IconJar(但我們建議您這樣做)。
localize.tagline: 直接在Adobe Illustrator中打開、編輯和創建IconJars

nodes.excerpt: Add image annotation capabilities to your web apps: - 10 marker types - move, resize, and rotate - change colors and styles - inline or popup - customizable UI - save and recall state - mouse, touch, or pen - full TypeScript support - extendable
nodes.title: marker.js 2 - Add image annotation features to your web apps
nodes.author: Alan Mendelevich

localize.description: 为您的Web应用程序添加图像批注功能：-10种标记类型-移动、调整大小和旋转-更改颜色和样式-内联或弹出-可自定义UI-保存和调用状态-鼠标、触摸或满笔打印支持-可扩展
localize.tagline: 向您的Web应用程序添加图像注记功能

localize.tagline: 向您的Web應用程序添加圖像註記功能

nodes.excerpt: Unstack's content platform now allows you to set up one-time and subscription payments as well as launch membership sites with granular page-level access controls for users. Turn your digital content into a money-making machine using Unstack and Stripe.

localize.description: Unstack的内容平台现在允许你设置一次性和订阅支付，以及推出会员网站，为用户提供细粒度的页面级访问控制。将您的数字内容变成一台赚钱的机器，使用Unstack and Strike(解栈和条带)。

nodes.excerpt: Sizey is a MacOS app that helps you calculate aspect ratios! ⠀ — ⠀ ⚡️ Add Custom Aspect Ratios ⠀ 💥 Round to the nearest whole # ⠀ ➡️ Keyboard Shortcuts ⠀ 📐 Scale & Densities (@1x, @2x, @3x) ⠀ 🙌 Landscape & Portrait modes — ⠀ You design. We’ll math. ❤️📐
nodes.title: Sizey: Aspect Ratio Calculator - Instantly calculate any aspect ratio.
nodes.author: Meritt Thomas

localize.description: Sizey是一款MacOS应用程序，可以帮助您计算纵横比！⠀-⠀⚡️添加自定义纵横比⠀💥舍入到最接近的整数#⠀➡️键盘快捷键⠀📐比例和密度(@1x，@2x，@3x)⠀🙌横向和纵向模式-您设计的⠀。我们要学数学。❤️📐
localize.tagline: 即时计算任何纵横比。

localize.description: Sizey是一款MacOS應用程序，可以幫助您計算縱橫比！⠀-⠀⚡️添加自定義縱橫比⠀💥舍入到最接近的整數#⠀➡️鍵盤快捷鍵⠀📐比例和密度(@1x，@2x，@3x)⠀🙌橫向和縱向模式-您設計的⠀。我們要學數學。❤️📐
localize.tagline: 即時計算任何縱橫比。

localize.tagline: 为设计师提供一个简单而免费的在线产品组合

localize.description: 展示你的才華吧！一個簡單和免費的設計師在線投資組合。由設計師爲設計師製作。😊
localize.tagline: 爲設計師提供一個簡單而免費的在線產品組合

nodes.excerpt: This is my first 3D illustration pack, I've prepared 15 3D hand gestures in cartoon style that can be used for user interfaces, social media posts, presentations, infographics and banners.
nodes.title: 3D Hand Gestures - Cute hand gestures for your designs.
nodes.author: Barış

localize.description: 这是我的第一个3D插图包，我已经准备了15个卡通风格的3D手势，可以用于用户界面、社交媒体帖子、演示文稿、信息图表和横幅。
localize.tagline: 你设计的可爱手势。

localize.description: 這是我的第一個3D插圖包，我已經準備了15個卡通風格的3D手勢，可以用於用戶界面、社交媒體帖子、演示文稿、信息圖表和橫幅。
localize.tagline: 你設計的可愛手勢。
